mapper.select: select sum(HerdsPig) HerdsPig, sum(HerdsNiu) HerdsNiu, sum(HerdsSheep) HerdsSheep, sum(HerdsOther) HerdsOther, sum(HerdsChicken) HerdsChicken, sum(HerdsDuck) HerdsDuck, sum(HerdsGoose) HerdsGoose, sum(HerdsOtherQ) HerdsOtherQ, sum(ImmuneBirdFluChecken) ImmuneBirdFluChecken, sum(ImmuneBirdFluDuck) ImmuneBirdFluDuck, sum(ImmuneBirdFluGoose) ImmuneBirdFluGoose, sum(ImmuneBirdFluOther) ImmuneBirdFluOther, sum(ImmuneAFMDNiu) ImmuneAFMDNiu, sum(ImmuneAFMDSheep) ImmuneAFMDSheep, sum(ImmuneBlueEar) ImmuneBlueEar, sum(ImmuneSwine) ImmuneSwine, sum(ImmuneNewcastle) ImmuneNewcastle, sum(ImmuneFMDPig) ImmuneFMDPig, sum(ImmuneFMDNiu) ImmuneFMDNiu, sum(ImmuneFMDSheep) ImmuneFMDSheep, sum(ImmuneFMDOther) ImmuneFMDOther, sum(PesteDesPetitsRuminants) PesteDesPetitsRuminants from animal_disease.b_livestockinout where Liv_regionCode=#{regionCode} AND LivestockDate BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY Liv_regionCode
